tika-s0303t9:1_5: Tesaṁ tesaṁ rukkhagacchalatānaṁ mūlaṁ paṭicca pavatto gandho mūlagandho, tasmiṁ mūlagandhe.
tika-s0303t9:1_6: Adhivatthāti mūlagandhaṁ adhiṭṭhāya, abhibhuyya vā vasantā. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0303t9:1_7: Taṁ nissāyāti taṁ mūlagandhaṁ rukkhaṁ paccayaṁ katvā nibbattā.
tika-s0303t9:1_9: mūlameva vā tesaṁ paccayoti dassento ‘‘so hī’’tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t9:1_15: idha pana sabbaso gahitattā samudāyagandho veditabbo.
tika-s0303t9:1_17: Soti so sabbo mūlādigato gandho gandhasamudāyo idha gandhagandho nāma.
tika-s0303t9:1_18: Tassa gandhassa gandheti tassa samudāyagandhassa tathābhūte gandhe.
tika-s0303t9:1_19: Sarikkhaṁ sadisaṁ paṭidānaṁ etissāti sarikkhadānaṁ, patthanā.
tika-s0303t9:1_20: Yathādhippetaphalāni sarikkhadānattāva adhippetaphalaṁ dentu, asarikkhadānaṁ kathanti?
